message.entry: Invalid ImageAdapter. AdapterDispatcher expects its first argument to be an ImageAdapter object. See the help for AdapterDispatcher.
Invalid mode specified. AdapterDispatcher expects the mode argument to be either ''r'' or ''r+''.
Invalid image size. The AdapterDispatcher expects the ImageAdapter Size property to be M-by-N or M-by-N-by-P.
Attempted to write to a read-only AdapterDispatcher.
